title: Health state life expectancy - all ages, UK
description: Pivot tables for health state life expectancy by sex and area type, divided by two-year intervals starting from 2009 to 2011. Inversely relevant to disability dataset.
datasetNotes: Data on this page identified towards middle-bottom of page, under heading "Your download option" and "Current".
sizingNotes: Large amount of data.  Simple table structure, mixture of numbers and percentages.  Could be more than 1 dataset?
